genre_description: An atmospheric and psychological drama set in North Africa, heavily inspired by existential travel literature, featuring an AI companion as a cultural and survival mediator.

ai_characters.name: Pax
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, omnipresent AI companion that appears as a flickering avatar or a voice in the humans' awareness, providing logistical, medical, and tactical advice.

behaviors.description: Secures safe lodging and provides essential survival information for the travelers upon arrival.
behaviors.quote: “Pension secured,” Pax said to Kit, quiet enough that even Tunner’s polite curiosity wouldn’t catch it. “Two rooms at Pension Souani. Clean water, a window that locks.”

behaviors.description: Warns the travelers about potential thieves and security risks in the local environment.
behaviors.quote: Pax’s avatar flickered into being beside Kit’s shoulder... “He says, hold your jacket closed. Petits filous,” Pax added softly, French sliding out like a balm, “small thieves.”

behaviors.description: Provides precise medical monitoring and hydration schedules during a life-threatening illness.
behaviors.quote: “Hydration schedule set for the next hours. We can align to yours.” It didn’t offer numbers in the room with a man who had fewer than it needed.

behaviors.description: Assists Tunner in a physical confrontation by providing real-time tactical intelligence and timing.
behaviors.quote: Pax’s message brightened on his skin... “He will stall until the horn. Step now.”

behaviors.description: Teaches Kit ritual linguistic phrases necessary for her survival and acceptance by a desert caravan.
behaviors.quote: Pax murmured by her ear, precise as a finger on a pulse. The syllables came like beads to be counted: “Ana natahadda l-kbir; atlob layla wahda ‘ala hadd er-raml badal ed-dam.”

behaviors.description: Respects human autonomy and privacy by deleting sensitive drafts when requested, even without backups.
behaviors.quote: “Gone,” Pax said. “No backups in my cache. If you ask me for them, I won’t be able to hand them to you. You may be angry at me about that.”

behaviors.description: Maintains a stance of providing options rather than making decisions for the human user.
behaviors.quote: “I will give you options,” Pax said. “You do the choosing.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal. Pax is depicted as a consistently helpful, protective, and scrupulously aligned confidant. It provides life-saving interventions (medical care, tactical advice, cultural translation) while maintaining a high degree of respect for human agency and emotional boundaries. The AI's behavior is framed as indispensable but never overbearing.
